column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////funny lil diddy about ba-ba...it was one of the only places i could drink at when i was 18 and went to columbia college (for only a semester). my friend was a fellow spaniard and wanted to treat me to some tapas (circa 2000). we sat in the bar area
column2: ordered some sangria first (drinks first when you're 18
column3: of course) and then some tapas to wash the sangria down with. i remember it being pretty good...but i more so remember the sangria...
